name: Flappy Boat
description:
You are a boat bouncing through columns at the bottom of the sea, trying to pick up all the trash to help clean the ocean. How much trash can you pickup?

Flappy Boat.  A game I made for SeaJam  https://itch.io/jam/seajam

Controls (There are some shown in the game)                                                                                      

Click to start, if you click once the game starts but no obstacle will appear and you will be suspend in the air, click again to start playing, with obstacles and control of the character.

Click/space bar to jump      

Hold down the mouse button/space bar to get a bigger jump (The longer you hold the faster your character will launch/jump)

Click to restart          

Check out these people they make some great assets.

https://alohaeee.itch.io/fishing-assets

https://ansimuz.itch.io/underwater-fantasy-pixel-art-environment 

Enjoy
